name: Cursed Ronin
description:
This is a Ludum50 project by solo dev, your health decays per second because of your cursed blade that you hold and you need suck your enemies soul to stay alive.

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

(It needs a lot of work and publishing but I’m glad that I crossed the finish line)

Controls:

W,D - Move

S - Slide

Space - Jump

Mouse1 - Attack

R - Restart

ESC - Quit
